entry.title: Election Posters?
entry.content:
There is just something about these two posters.. the style maybe, makes me wonder if there is a connection....

[caption id="attachment_288" align="alignnone" width="300" caption="A Future Fair For All"][/caption]

[caption id="attachment_289" align="alignnone" width="222" caption="To Victory"][/caption]

entry.title: Water Fight
entry.content: On Sunday afternoon I was chatting to my neighbour Nikki with her young lad Sunny. He was armed with a water pistol and before I knew it, I was engaged in full scale water battle! It was hilarious and reminded me what a child I am at heart! Both of us ended up wet but happy...
